folderPath.value:
@{concat(
    'extract/',
    '/year=' ,convertTimeZone(utcnow('yyyy'), 'UTC', 'Central Europe Standard Time'),
    '/month=' ,convertTimeZone(utcnow('MM'), 'UTC', 'Central Europe Standard Time'),
    '/day=' ,convertTimeZone(utcnow('dd'), 'UTC', 'Central Europe Standard Time'),
    '/hour=' ,convertTimeZone(utcnow('HH'), 'UTC', 'Central Europe Standard Time'))}
